summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Lot 4, Block 6, Jordan's Acre Gardens; Parcel 1, King County Short Plat No. S879S0286; Section 22, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; vacated West Cremona Street lying between 5th and 6th Avenues West and vacated 4th Avenue West lying north of West Dravus Street; Lot 4, Block 1, North Side Five Acre Tracts; Section 6, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Lots 1 and 4 of King County Short Plat No. S90S0297; Lot 8, Block 59, Second Plat of West Seattle by the West Seattle Land and Improvement Company; Lot 1, Block 26, Beverly Park Division No. 3; Lot 10, Block 3, Glenwood Home Tracts; Lot 24, Block 2, Supplemental Plat of Summit Park Addition to the City of Seattle; Lots A and B, King County Boundary Line Adjustment No. 93-03; and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
